verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Was Seen <S%G3700><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven; <S%G3772><s%> A Women <S%G1135><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Moon <S%G4582><s%> Under <S%G5270><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Her Feet, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Her Head <S%G846><s%> A Crown <S%G4735><s%> Of Stars <S%G792><s%> Twelve; <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> Being With Child <S%G2192><s%> She Cries <S%G2896><s%> Being In Travail, <S%G5605><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Being In Pain <S%G928><s%> To Bring Forth. <S%G5088><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Seen <S%G3700><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Dragon <S%G1404><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Red, <S%G4450><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Heads <S%G2776><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Horns <S%G2768><s%> Ten, <S%G1176><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> His Heads <S%G846><s%> Diadems <S%G1238><s%> Seven; <S%G2033><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3769><s%> His Tail <S%G846><s%> Drags <S%G4951><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cast <S%G906><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon <S%G1404><s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Bring Forth, <S%G5088><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When She <S%G3752><s%> Should Bring Forth, <S%G5088><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Child <S%G846><s%> He Might Devour. <S%G2719><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> She Brought Forth <S%G5088><s%> A Son <S%G5207><s%> , Male, <S%G730><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Rod <S%G4464><s%> An Iron : <S%G4603><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Caught Away <S%G726><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Child <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2362><s%> His Throne. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Fled <S%G5343><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> She Has <S%G2192><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> Prepared <S%G2090><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> They Should Nourish <S%G5142><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Two Hundred And <S%G1250><s%> Sixty. <S%G1835><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> War <S%G4171><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven : <S%G3772><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels <S%G846><s%> Warred <S%G4170><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon, <S%G1404><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon <S%G1404><s%> Warred, <S%G4170><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> , They Prevailed, <S%G2480><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Was Found <S%G2147><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Any More <S%G2089><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Cast Out <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon <S%G1404><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serpent <S%G3789><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ancient, <S%G744><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Satan, <S%G4567><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Misleads <S%G4105><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable <S%G3625><s%> World Whole, <S%G3650><s%> He Was Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angels <S%G846><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were Cast. <S%G906><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> Is Come <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Of His; <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Cast Down <S%G2598><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Accuser <S%G2725><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Of Our Brethren, <S%G2257><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Accuses <S%G2723><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God <S%G2257><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night. <S%G3571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Overcame <S%G3528><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> By Reason <S%G1223><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb, <S%G721><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By Reason <S%G1223><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3141><s%> Of Their Testimony, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Their Life <S%G846><s%> Unto <S%G891><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Rejoice Ye <S%G2165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> And Ye <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Tabernacle. <S%G4637><s%> Woe <S%G3759><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Inhabit <S%G2730><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Is Come Down <S%G2597><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Short <S%G3641><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> He Has. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Given <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Wings <S%G4420><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Eagle <S%G105><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> She Might Fly <S%G4072><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wilderness <S%G2048><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5117><s%> Her Place, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> She Is Nourished <S%G5142><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> A Time, <S%G2540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Times, <S%G2540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Half <S%G2255><s%> A Time, <S%G2540><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Serpent. <S%G3789><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Serpent <S%G3789><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth <S%G846><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A River, <S%G4215><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Her As One <S%G3778><s%> Carried Away By A River <S%G4216><s%> He Might Make. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Helped <S%G997><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Its, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Swallowed Up <S%G2666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> River <S%G4215><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dragon <S%G1404><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth. <S%G846><s%>
